name: Hikari (itch) (Marty Starkiller (Twin Pines Soft))
description:
Sometimes you want to go out from your small confined place you're every day. Sometimes you want to go out and explore nature, the world! But what if you do that to survive?

You escaped from your old outpost on a moon because...   ...reasons...
And now you're completely lost on an entirely unknown planet. And there's nothing else to do, so why not explore?

In this game, you can explore 3 massive planets where you can find upgrades, encounter dangerous enemies, and maybe...   ...make allies?

If you're a fan of metroidvanias this is the game for you!

This game was made for the A Game By Its Cover game jam inspired by this famicase.
